fields.summary: Add a config entry to make IPC.Client checkAsyncCall off by default
fields.description: Add a config entry to make IPC.Client checkAsyncCall off by default

comments.body:
hfutatzhanghb opened a new pull request, #7521:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7521

   ### Description of PR
    Add a config entry to make IPC.Client checkAsyncCall off by default.
   
   ### How was this patch tested?
   Add unit test.

hfutatzhanghb commented on PR #7521:
URL: https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7521#issuecomment-2735176237

   Hi, @KeeProMise , Please help review this PR when you have free time, Thanks ahead.  And i will close HDFS-17758 https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/7501 .
